document_data.name: Nanoc
document_data.mainbody:
'''Nanoc''', also known as '''Nanoc the Barbarian''', was a novice [[adventurer]] and [[warrior]].

{{Quote|''"With steel in hand, I walk amongst unknown dangers. Always I am victori..."''|Nanoc the Barbarian}}
document_data.Personality: The barbarian was proud and arrogant. He prided himself on being raised in the North, and stated that he was immune to the pathetic civilized way of men.
document_data.Possessions: The adventurer owned a standard set of [[hide armor]] and a [[greatsword]].
document_data.History:
Nanoc first lived in the harsh lands of the North.

He met his fellow adventurers, [[Bondari]] and [[Tim Goldenhand]] in a [[tavern]]. The group foolishly decided to enter a cavern to the [[Underdark]], and they encountered the mad wizard [[Iycanth]]'s creations. The creatures quickly petrified the trio, turning them to stone.
